articles.title: Anderson Cooper: We've entered the 'perfect phone call' phase of the Mar-a-Lago saga - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Anderson Cooper reacts to some of former President Donald Trump's allies' reactions to the FBI's search of Mar-a-Lago.

articles.title: See what happens when a fire drought meets a rain drought - CNN Video
articles.description: Americans have been told for decades to prevent wildfires. That's left a lot of fuel to burn, and with climate change having an impact too, Californians have a lot to rethink, reports CNN's Bill Weir.

articles.author: Omar Nor, CNN
articles.title: Mogadishu hotel attack: Death toll rises
articles.description: At least 20 people have been killed after unidentified gunmen stormed an upscale hotel in the Somali capital, Mogadishu, on Friday evening, officials said, following gunfire and large explosions in the area.
articles.content: Mogadishu, Somalia (CNN)At least 20 people have been killed after unidentified gunmen stormed an upscale hotel in the Somali capital, Mogadishu, on Friday evening, officials said, following gunfire a… [+2050 chars]

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Target just went from great to bad to ugly. But the worst may be over
articles.description: Target just demonstrated how quickly things can change for the worse in the world of retail. But the big box retailer is promising things will change in the other direction just as fast.

articles.author: Haley Brink, CNN meteorologist
articles.title: 'Prolific rainfall and widespread flash flooding' threaten nearly 10 million people across the Southwest
articles.description: Nearly 10 million people across Arizona, New Mexico and western Texas are under flood watches Saturday, including Phoenix, Albuquerque and El Paso.
articles.content:
(CNN)Nearly 10 million people across Arizona, New Mexico and western Texas are under flood watches Saturday, including Phoenix, Albuquerque and El Paso.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Mitch McConnell is right. Senate Republicans have a candidate problem.
articles.description: We've become used to displays of braggadocio by politicians (see former President Donald Trump). That's why it's notable when a politician admits that the political winds might not be going their way.

articles.author: Laura Studley and Zoe Sottile, CNN
articles.title: Four victims of the McKinney Fire positively identified through DNA and dental analysis
articles.description: Officials have identified four people killed in the McKinney Fire in California as residents of the same community.

articles.author: Natalie Croker, Renée Rigdon, Judson Jones, Carlotta Dotto and Angela Dewan, CNN
articles.title: The world's rivers are drying up from extreme weather. See how 6 look from space
articles.description: To be stuck "up a river without a paddle" is an expression for a sticky situation you just can't get out of. But if that river happens to be in the northern hemisphere this summer, it's likely the paddle won't be helpful, anyway.
articles.content: (CNN)To be stuck "up a river without a paddle" is an expression for a sticky situation you just can't get out of. But if that river happens to be in the northern hemisphere this summer, it's likely t… [+6059 chars]

articles.author: Paul Vercammen, CNN
articles.title: Would you rip up your lawn for $6 a square foot? Welcome to drought-stricken California
articles.description: The megadrought affecting the American West has been record-breaking, with no tangible relief in sight. It's forcing cities to crack down on lawn-watering, and paying residents to replace their lawns with drought-resistant plants.

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: The evergreen tree that outlasted the dinosaurs is now endangered
articles.description: Only found in the wild in Patagonia, the monkey puzzle tree, Araucaria araucana, has unusual features that evolved as a defense against long-necked dinosaurs, scientists believe. The ancient species is now endangered, but a particularly messy eater may be hel…
articles.content:
The new docuseries "Patagonia: Life on the Edge of the World" explores one of the wildest places on Earth. The six-part series is available on CNNgo. You can also access CNNgo via our CNN app.
